channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light outside no. 6 Coptic Street., 24th October
item.description:
The street light outside no. 6 Coptic Street is still not working. An engineer fixed the street light outside no. 8 Coptic Street but the street light outside no. 6 remains broken. Please can you send an engineer to fix the street light outside no. 6 Coptic Street. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Great Russell Street, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Homeless people living in a tent on Bromfield Court Green., 24th October
item.description:
Once again we have homeless living out of a tent on the green of Bromfield Court. There are two females who have been seen leaving the tent today. Whilst I am not without sympathy for anyone who is homeless I would be very grateful if the Council could find these women a home somewhere. The green is not a suitable place for them to be living especially as winter is coming. Thank you for you help in this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): John Roll Way, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Morrisons trolley on pavement, 24th October
item.description:
This has been there a few days and is likely in heavy wind to roll into and damage a vehicle. It will also encourage other people to leave items in the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Appledore Crescent, Longlands, London

item.title: There has been a collision between a black Mercedes and 276 bus on Osborne Road not far from Gainsborough school. There is hazards and safety concerns with the bend on Osborne Road towards Gainsborough school this is a daily occurrence of near miss and collisions. If somebody from the safety department could do a survey on this spot of Road. Black Mercedes car in collision causing obstruction in Osborne Road garages with hazard lights on resident leaseholder unable to access garage door.If Hackney Council got the barrier gate fix when people raised repair jobs and reports Leaseholders garage would not be blocked., 24th October
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown hedges and trees, 24th October
item.description:

item.title: Bins have not been collected in two weeks, 24th October
